articles.content: Ace choreographer Vaibhavi Merchant has had a great year at the movies, with Besharam Rang (Pathaan), Tum Kya Mile, Kudmayee, Dhindhora Baaje Re (Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani), Not Ramaiya Vastavi… [+7974 chars]

articles.title: Pooja Hegde buys Range Rover SV worth Rs 4 crore.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Actress Pooja Hegde has recently acquired a silver Range Rover SV, reportedly valued at around ₹4 crore.
articles.content:
Actress Pooja Hegde has recently acquired a silver Range Rover SV, reportedly valued at around 4 crore.

articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's daughter Raha Kapoor will be turning one next month. They are yet to reveal the face of the little one. | Bollywood
